title: The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery
description:
Who Dunnit: The Improvised Murder Mystery is now The Unusual Suspects... new name, same great show.

The hottest show in the history of the 757 is NOW A NATIONALLY TOURING SHOW!

The Unusual Suspects

There’s been a murder. Everyone is a suspect. The actors on stage. Even you.

Welcome to The Unusual Suspects, an improvised murder mystery comedy.

Throughout the night, the world’s greatest detective will interrogate a cast of unusual characters, from the wacky to the dastardly.

You’ll find yourself face to face with our notorious investigator. Could he be Sherlock, Columbo, Jessica Fletcher? Not exactly. The catch is, no one ever knows which detective will show up.

No one is above suspicion, including you and your guests.

Join us at the hit show that’s played to sold-out audiences for more than three years and counting. This isn’t your standard dinner detective fare; get ready for a wild and funny night that everyone will be talking about the next day, your family, your friends, and maybe even your priest.

The Unusual Suspects is brought to you by the writers and producers of the off-Broadway and national hit: Cuff Me: The Fifty Shades of Grey Musical Parody.

The Unusual Suspects: An Improvised Murder Mystery Comedy

The second Saturday of every month at the Push Comedy Theater

The show starts at 8pm, tickets are $15

The Push Comedy Theater only has 99 seats, so we recommend you get your tickets in advance.

---

The Push Comedy Theater is a 99 seat venue in the heart of Norfolk's brand new Arts District. Founded by local comedy group The Pushers, the Push Comedy Theater is dedicated to bringing you live comedy from the best local and national acts.

The Push Comedy Theater hosts live sketch, improv and stand-up comedy on Friday and Saturday nights. During the week classes are offered in stand-up, sketch and improv comedy as well as acting.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.

title: The Unusual Suspects: Murder Mystery Tour
description:
The Push Comedy Theater's Hottest Show is Back... with a Twist.
Get ready for the Unusual Suspects: A Murder Mystery Tour.

There's been a murder in the NEON District and you will follow a crack detective around the NEON as he searches for the killer.  But will you be an assistant... or a suspect?

The Unusual Suspects: A Murder Mystery Tour is a hilarious and interactive Murder Mystery Tour through Norfolk's Arts District.  Detective Brad McMurran will lead you through the various crime scenes where you will meet all the wacky characters you've come to expect with the Unusual Suspects.

This event is outdoors and socially distanced, with the audience limited to only 25 people.
The Push Comedy Theater is teaming with Commune and La Brioche to make this a totally immersive show.

Your ticket includes:
A Murderous Bite prepared by a CROP Foundation Lil' Chef courtesy of Commune
A Dastardly Dessert prepared by La Brioche
and a $3 Drink Voucher for a Push Comedy Theater beverage.

Commune and La Brioche with also be offering themed, adult beverages for purchase.

Don't miss the Unusual Suspects: A Murder Mystery Tour.  It's all the Push Comedy craziness you love... but outdoors, socially distanced and completely unforgettable.

The Unusual Suspects: Murder Mystery Tour
Friday and Saturday, March 12 and 13
7pm at The Plot (across the street from the Push Comedy Theater)
776 Granby St, Norfolk, VA 23510
Tickets are $35 and include a dish from Commune, dessert from La Brioche and $3 drink voucher from the Push Comedy Theater.

 
The Unusual Suspects is brought to you by the writers and producers of the off-Broadway and national hit: Cuff Me: The Fifty Shades of Grey Musical Parody.   Pre Covid, it was the hottest show in the history of the 757 and had monthly performances in Las Vegas.
There’s been a murder. Everyone is a suspect.  Even you.
Welcome to The Unusual Suspects, an improvised murder mystery comedy.
Throughout the night, the world’s greatest detective will interrogate a cast of unusual characters, from the wacky to the dastardly.
You’ll find yourself face to face with our notorious investigator. Could he be Sherlock, Columbo, Jessica Fletcher? Not exactly. The catch is, no one ever knows which detective will show up.
No one is above suspicion, including you and your guests.

Who knew murder could be so much fun!

title: Knock the Rust Off - Improv Workshop
description:
It's time to kick the rust off those improv skills!  This is a 4 week workshop that will consist of one lesson a night... and a whole lot of reps.
 
This will be a hybrid indoor/outdoor class. Weather permitting most classes will be held outdoors. Masks are required and social distancing guidelines will be followed.

This is a four week class that meets every Wednesday from 6:30 PM to 8:30 PM
Cost: $150

If you purchased a Push Comedy Theater gift certificate or Class Voucher, contact us at pusherscomedy@gmail.com and we will get you set up.

About the instructor:
Brad McMurran is the founder of The Pushers Sketch and Improv Comedy Troupe. He is the co-head writer, performer, and artistic director of the Push Comedy Theater.
Brad studied acting at ODU, trained in improvisation at Upright Citizen's Brigades, and is the co-writer of the off-Broadway hit, Cuff Me; The 50 Shades of Grey Musical Parody.

Whether you're a die-hard comedy lover or a casual fan... a seasoned performer or someone who's never stepped foot on stage... the Push Comedy Theater has something for you.
Yes, and any questions? Email pusherscomedy@gmail.com
Date and time
